log-name-legallogin: Name of log that appears on [[Special:Log]].
log-description-legallogin: Display description for log name for changes in LegalLogin in Special:Log.
legallogin-policy-checkbox-label:
Label of the checkbox used to accept the policy.

Parameters:
* $1 - caption of the policy
legallogin-policy-text-caption:
Part of policy name caption.

Parameters:
* $1 - the policy revision number
* $2 - the policy revision date
legallogin-policy-full-page-view: Text of link to show the policy in full screen
legallogin-true-answer-label: Text of label for answer on LegalLogin question as True
legallogin-false-answer-label:
Text of label for answer on LegalLogin question as False
{{identical|False}}
legallogin-extra-fields-required-for-acc: An error message shown when it creates account without LegalLogin fields data
legallogin-extra-fields-were-changed: An error message shown when LegalLogin fields were changed while user filled out the login form
legallogin-policy-must-be-read:
An error message shown when user accepted a policy without reading one but reading one is required

Parameters:
* $1 - caption of the policy
legallogin-policy-must-be-accepted:
An error message shown when user didn't accept a policy

Parameters:
* $1 - caption of the policy
legallogin-incorrect-answer-on-question:
An error message shown when user answered incorrectly on a question

Parameters:
* $1 - text of the question
legallogin-logentry-policy:
Information about accepted LegalLogin policies in Special:Log.

Parameters:
* $1 - link to the legal login policy
* $2 - id of the legal login policy
$3 - required the policy to be opened or not
* $4 - was scrolled the policy at the end or not
* $5 - was the policy opened in full screen or not
* $6 - was the policy accepted or not
legallogin-logentry-login:
Information about opened LegalLogin polices in Special:Log.

Parameters:
* $1 - link to the legal login policy
* $2 - id of the legal login policy
$3 - was opened the policy or not
legallogin-logentry-question:
Information about answer in Special:Log.

* $1 - Link to the question
* $2 - user's answer on the question
legallogin-complete-checkboxes: Label of submit button which shown until user correctly completed LegalLogin checkboxes.
legallogin-submit:
Label of submit button when user correctly completed LegalLogin checkboxes.
{{identical|Submit}}
legallogin-close: Label of close button in LegalLogin fullscreen dialog
legallogin-yes:
Text of label for positive statements in Special:Log.
{{identical|Yes}}
legallogin-no:
Text of label for negative statements in Special:Log.
{{identical|No}}
legallogin-js-should-be-enabled: Text shown for users when Javascript is not enabled in the browser
legallogin-policies-must-be-accepted: Error message when user didn't accept LegalLogin polices
legallogin-debug-acceptance:
{{optional}}
Information about accepted LegalLogin polices in log file.

Parameters:
* $1 - user id
* $2 - user name
* $3 - string contains accepted polices and answered questions
legallogin-debug-login:
{{optional}}
Information about opened LegalLogin polices in log file.

Parameters:
* $1 - user id
* $2 - user name
* $3 - information about LegalLogin state
logentry-legallogin-accept:
Message about accepted LegalLogin polices in Special:Log

Parameters:* $1 - link to the user page
* $4 - number of accepted policies
* $5 - information about accepted policies
* $6 - number of answered questions
* $7 - information about answered questions
* $8 - number of user logins since last acceptance
* $9 - date of last login of the user
* $10 - link to the git repo of the LegalLogin extension
logentry-legallogin-login:
Message about opened LegalLogin polices in Special:Log

Parameters:* $1 - link to the user page
* $4 - information about opened LegalLogin polices
* $5 - number of login since last acceptance
* $6 - datetime of the message
* $7 - was acceptance required or not
* $8 - link to the git repo of the LegalLogin extension
